speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Mr van den Berg on behalf of the Committee on Development on aid effectiveness and corruption in developing countries [ 2005/2141(INI) ] ( A6-0048/2006 ).

agenda_item: Aid effectiveness and corruption in developing countries (debate)
